item.title: Patients Are Dying in Hospital Corridors, British Nurses Say
item.description: A damning report on overcrowded hospitals added fuel to a painful debate over the crises at the National Health Service.

item.title: Saif Ali Khan, Famed Bollywood Actor, Is Stabbed at Home in Mumbai
item.description: The police said Mr. Khan was recovering in the hospital after an intruder attacked him. He sustained a major injury to his spinal cord, a doctor said.
